siteMetadata.title: Matthieu Oger
siteMetadata.author: Matthieu Oger
siteMetadata.description: I am a product manager, developer and designer from France. Co-founder of Pixelnest Studio.

markdownRemark.html:
Advertising is effective only because so many people think “Ads don't influence me” and “Ads give me what I want for free”.

— Jonathan Blow (@Jonathan_Blow)

excerptQuote.name: Jonathan Blow
excerptQuote.quote: Advertising is effective only because so many people think “Ads don't influence me” and “Ads give me what I want for free”.
